data.text: @Tinfoil_Travis What’s the proposed alternative? Do we sit back and take no action? Doesn’t a reduction in oil imports increase the $value of crude which in turn benefits the local economy? Also the great reset was a slogan to restart the economy from its current deficit.

@Tinfoil_Travis We are a banana republic & the most woke one at that. We are the cleanest producers of oil & gas in the world & import 1/3 of our oil from despots like Saudi Arabia & Russia because we won’t build a trans Canada pipeline to the east coast

@Ian51194442 Nailed it. Funny story that most don’t know: In Newfoundland’s last budget, they announced we were near bankruptcy so they announced a bunch of projected ways out of that, and ACTUALLY called it the “Big Reset.” Lmao. 

https://t.co/rUDZnHtrEo https://t.co/qASLWFfj4m

@Tinfoil_Travis No worries the NDP voted with trudeau on his EA. So in return they can finally get the UBI. It's only going to be a increase of 47% on income tax. The finance minister says we can't afford not to do this. We are so fucked.

What do we do when the lights go out? Do we really want more dependence on the state right now? More compliance? Global leaders that uprooted our way of life are ready to extend their hand with “solutions,” expecting your applause rather than accountability for their actions. 4/4

Not to mention the threats of retaliation. Blaming Russia for cyberattacks despite the WEF planning “Cyber Polygon,” that Klaus Schwab said would be worse than the “current crisis.” Hegelian Dialectics in plain sight, but too outrageous to be recognized. #NewWorldOrder 3/4 https://t.co/V73OASIium

4) The narrative is NOT “Why didn’t we build our own pipeline to take energy dependence away from places like Russia?” Instead, the narrative is: “SEE!? This is exactly why we need to shift away from fossil fuels entirely.” 

This plays right into The Great Reset. #WEF 2/4 https://t.co/Idl4FcIcbx
